item.title: Project Euler Problem 1
item.description: Multiples of 3 and 5 If we list all the natural numbers below 10 that are multiples of 3 or 5, we get 3, 5, 6 and 9. The sum of these multiples is 23. Find the sum of all the multiples of 3 or 5 below 1000. sum = 3 * (1 + 999 / 3) * (999 / 3) / 2 + \ 5 * (1 + 999
